item.title: Pakistan petition radio report (January 13, 2011)
item.itunes:subtitle: Release CEO Andy Dipper and patron Bishop Michael Nazir-Ali have presented a 51,000-signature petition to the Pakistan High Commission in London, calling on the Government to uphold religious freedoms for the Christian minority. Andrew Boyd reports.
item.description: Release CEO Andy Dipper and patron Bishop Michael Nazir-Ali have presented a 51,000-signature petition to the Pakistan High Commission in London, calling on the Government to uphold religious freedoms for the Christian minority. Andrew Boyd reports.
item.author: info@releaseinternational.org (Release International)
item.itunes:author: Release International

item.title: World Update 35 (July 2009)
item.itunes:subtitle: Release International's monthly video podcast features news about the persecuted church in China, Egypt, India and Iran (10 mins). Find out more at www.releaseinternational.org/webcast.
